meanings.definition: A person who rewords or restates a text in their own words.
meanings.sent1: The paraphrasers in the class helped me understand the story better.
meanings.sent2: The website offers a service where paraphrasers can rewrite articles for a fee.
meanings.sent3: The group of paraphrasers at the library made the boring textbook sound like an exciting novel.
meanings.sent4: Her skill as a paraphraser turned the complex scientific paper into a simple children's story.
meanings.sent5: The paraphrasers at the conference were like language magicians, transforming words effortlessly.

meanings.definition: Those who provide a rephrased version of a written work.
meanings.sent1: The paraphrasers submitted their revised essays to the teacher.
meanings.sent2: Online platforms connect clients with professional paraphrasers for document editing.
meanings.sent3: The team of paraphrasers turned the legal document into a fun and engaging read.
meanings.sent4: The paraphrasers' creativity breathed new life into the old manuscript.
meanings.sent5: The paraphrasers' work was so seamless that it was hard to tell it was a rewritten piece.
